text: Araby, ostavshiyesya doma, skazhut tebe: "Nas ozabochivali stada nashi, semeystva nashi; isprosi proshcheniya nam!" Oni yazykami svoimi govoryat to, chego u nikh net v serdtsakh ikh. Skazhi: "Kto mozhet v pol'zu vashu v chem-libo peremoch' Boga, yesli zakhochet On sdelat' chto-libo vrednoye dlya vas, ili zakhochet sdelat' chto-libo poleznoye vam?" Net, Bog vedal, chto delali vy
